solution_line_template: {num_students} x {artworks_per_student} = <<{num_students}*{artworks_per_student}={artworks_per_quarter}>>{artworks_per_quarter} artworks can be collected in one quarter.
So in one school year, a total of {artworks_per_quarter} x {quarters_per_year} = <<{artworks_per_quarter}*{quarters_per_year}={artworks_per_year}>>{artworks_per_year} artworks can be collected.
Therefore, {artworks_per_year} x {num_school_years} = <<{artworks_per_year}*{num_school_years}={total_artworks}>>{total_artworks} artworks can be collected in two school years.
